text: @realDonaldTrump Governor Andrew Cuomo just eviscerated you on National TV, you whiny lump. Stop watching TV and tweeting and do your job. Cuomo is the leader you will never be. And you know it.  https://t.co/F4KEnDXhNV https://t.co/hJmugFe6oT
